title: Playlistr
description: A MERN stack application that utilizes the Spotify API so multiple users can share one queue, add songs to it, and have a chance to control the music.

title: Project Sprinter
description: An application that breaks down a project into phases for easy management and maximum productivity. Users can create projects as an administrator, track phases as a project manager and complete tasks as a developer.

title: Band Explorer
description: An interactive website that displays music artist information based on user input.
